content: S-B (T-D) Diamond screwdriver bit High-performance diamond-coated screwdriver bit for hard joint applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Bits and sockets- - ### FEATURES:Features Manufactured from high-strength steel – reduces the risk of premature bit breakage Diamond coating for a more secure fit in the screw – virtually eliminates slipping and jumping out Perfect-fit geometry for greater driving grip, precision-machined to help reduce stripping and wobbling Applications ¼ hexagon connection end for use with all common bit holders (DIN ISO 1173-D 6.3) Recommended for use in hard-joint applications e.g. in metal or concrete For driving screws and screw anchors in a variety of materials Torx®, Phillips®, square, hexagon and Pozi® versions available ### TECHNICAL DATA: Length: 1 in Connection end: 1/4 in Hex shank Technical Data | Connection end | 1/4 in Hex shank ### ITEMS- 2039038 - Diamond insert bits #2 PHL TEK 10 pk - Package Size 10 pc
